CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . MOT is holding CHI who is looking at the toys on the floor .
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI is out of camera view
MOT sits in chair near door
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
sighs with the effort of throwing the ball
CHI turns to look at MOT
CHI throws the ball on the floor
CHI walks across the room to get the ball
<bef> CHI picks up ball and carries it to the wall . CHI sits down near the wall with the ball
CHI hits the ball with his hand several times .
CHI throws the ball behind MOT's chair and crawls over to retrieve it
MOT looks at adjacent wall then down at CHI
CHI is mostly out of camera view
MOT turns to face middle of the room
MOT turns around in her chair to talk to CHI
CHI stands up and starts to walk across the room with the ball
<bef> turns back and looks at toy car on floor in front of her
MOT points to the toy car
CHI chews the football as he walks across the room
MOT stops pointing and watches CHI
CHI stops walking and stands in the middle of the room
CHI climbs up onto the chair and then drops the ball while trying to stand up on it
CHi reaches behind the chair and then stands straight up
MOT pulls up CHI's pants and then bends down to get the ball
MOT gets the ball and stands back holding it out to CHI
CHI stands up on the chair
CHI looks in the one-way mirror and then looks at MOT
MOT walks around to side of CHI and offers the ball to him
CHI stretches out hand to take ball
<bef> CHI looks into the window lets the ball fall from his hand . CHI looks down and then looks into the mirror again
CHI looking from side to side and around the room
CHI stands up and bounces on his heels on the chair
CHI looks at himself in window and smiling widely
CHI stamps his feet on the chair in a fit of excitement
CHI looks in mirror and opens his mouth wide
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI faces MOT and points up to the ceiling of the lab
both MOt and object CHI points to are out of camera view
MOT looks where CHI is pointing
CHI is smiling as he turns towards mirror and then to camera but keeps arm up in the air and finger pointed
CHI stares at the camera and towards the table
CHI looks toward camera but down slightly and points towards the table
the microphone is out of camera view
CHI looks at the camera and then turns and looks at MOT
CHI looks in mirror and points to the camera which is straight out to one side
CHI looks around the room and points behind him keeping his arm straight out to the side
CHI looks at something across the room and points backwards at it
MOT steps backwards and faces CHI
CHI turns and looks up towards the mirror and smiles then turns to face the table
MOT still almost completely out of camera view
CHI keeps reaching for microphone but looks up at camera
camera is moving to keep CHI in view
CHI looks up at camera then turns to look at something on the wall near the mirror
CHI smiles and points to the object
<aft> CHI looks up at the camera with his arms still raised from pointing
CHI puts his hand on wall where he was pointing and stares up at camera then turns and looks behind himself to the middle of the room
MOT walks over to the chair she was sitting in
CHI walks over to football in the middle of the room
<aft> MOT holds out hand to catch ball
CHI extends arm with football towards MOT
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
CHI throws the football towards waste basket
CHI walks over to waste basket
CHI bend down to get the ball and accidentally throws his arm into waste basket
CHI looks into the waste basket and then towards MOT
MOT walks over to waste basket and throws paper into it
CHI stands up holding onto waste basket
MOT continues to stand by waste basket as she watches CHI
CHI tries to pick up the wastebasket
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles
CHI sits down by waste basket and tries to pick up ball
CHI manages to retrieve the ball
CHI holds the ball up briefly
CHI leans around behind himself and puts the ball into the waste basket
MOT takes the ball out of the waste basket
<bef> MOT drops the ball into center of room <aft> MOT picks up ball and sits down on chair
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI follows MOT over to chair
CHI starts to walk away from MOT with ball
MOT holds CHI tight with her legs and he cannot run away
CHI smiles and looks at the camera
CHI falls to a sitting position
MOT bends over and tickles CHI
CHI stands up and moves to side table , then throws the ball down and climbs up on the table
MOT sits in chair and watches CHI
CHI holds onto top drawer as he tries to climb up on the desk
the top drawer opens up and the CHI falls to the ground under it
<bef> MOT watches as CHI falls and sees that he is not hurt
MOT grabs the drawer and pushes it back in
MOT holds the drawer closed as she looks at CHI
CHI pulls himself up so that he is standing on a stool on the floor
CHI looks over the top of the table
CHI examines the pens and other objects on the table top
MOT stands up and moves the objects away from CHI
MOT strokes CHI's back in time to the music
CHI points to a paper on the desk
CHI points to the objects on the table <aft> CHI looks around
<aft> CHI starts to get down from the box he is on
CHI looks up at the table
CHI starts to walk behind the table
INV enters the room at 12:12:50 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room at 12:14:10 while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters the room at 12:18:38 .
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV clears the toys from Small Scale Activity away and gives CHI the slinky toy to hold
INV takes forbidden object out of the drawer
CHI leans over to see what INV is doing
INV puts the object on the table and sets it in motion
CHI reaches out for the object
MOT leans forward and gesture towards CHI but doesn't touch him
CHI retracts his hand and looks at the object
CHI looks at the object and blinks
<bef> CHI looks down at the slinky toy
CHI plays with the slinky toy and throws it to the floor
INV tells MOT about the Parent Child Interaction boxes . INV picks up the toys and leaves the room
MOT takes the ball out of the box
CHI is standing by table in middle of room
MOT sits on the ground with legs apart , holding the ball . <aft> MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI reaches out for the ball
MOT throws ball at CHI's tummy
CHI takes a step towards MOT and falls down on ball which has rolled between MOT's outstretched legs
CHI sits up near MOT holding the ball
MOT holds her hands out for the ball
CHI looks up at MOT smiling
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball towards opposite wall
CHI is kneeling by the ball , looking towards table
CHI is partially out of camera view
CHI stares blankly towards the table
CHI is still staring towards table
MOT holds her hands out to receive the ball
the ball bounces off MOT's foot and rolls towards CHI
CHI crawls after ball which has rolled towards table
ball bounces up and down then rolls behind CHI and away from MOT
CHI crawls after ball . <aft> CHI kneels down and holds ball
MOT holds her arms out to get the ball
CHI swings body and ball away from MOT
CHI puts the ball on the floor and then holds it up to the wall again
CHI swings body and ball away from MOT again
CHI stands up with ball and walks towards the door
<1- .3> rising in mock tone of anger
CHI is walking with ball around MOT and towards door
CHI crashes into the door holding the ball
CHI reaches up towards door handle
MOT reaches over and tickles CHI
CHI drops the ball and falls to the floor
MOT turns around and holds the ball in front of CHI
CHI takes the ball from MOT
CHI opens his mouth wide with excitement
CHI holds ball to face and walks around room towards camera
CHI stares at the camera and extends an arm up to it
< .1-2> MOT looks back and forth between camera and CHI
MOT holds her hands out to CHI
CHI runs to MOT with the ball
MOT puts her arms around CHI
MOT stands up with one arm around CHI
MOT opens another box off screen
CHI glances at MOT and then stares at the camera
CHI holds the ball and stares at the camera
MOT leans over to CHI and tries to get him to look at her
MOT gets the cloth out of the box
MOT walks over to CHI with the towel
CHI walks away from MOT with the ball
MOT follows CHI and unfolds the towel
CHI holds ball up against the wall and looks up towards camera
CHI walks with towel on his head and falls over taking the towel off his head
MOT kneels in front of CHI
MOT throws the towel over CHI
CHI crawls around with towel on his head
CHI struggles under the towel to get it off his head
CHI throws the towel off and crawls away towards the door
CHI crawls away towards the door
MOT turns around and holds towel up to face CHI
CHI turns around to face camera but doesn't looks at MOT
MOT holds towel up and looks at CHI
MOT drops towel to her lap and looks at CHI
<bef> MOT covers her face with the towel
CHI looks at MOT and smiles <aft> CHI looks away
CHI looks at MOT again and then CHI looks at the door
CHI moves over to the doorknob
MOT pulls down the towel to uncovers her eyes
CHI tries to reach the door handle
MOT hides her face behind the towel
<bef> MOT covers her face with the towel
CHI starts to move away from MOT
MOT grabs CHI with towel then takes the towel and tries to cover CHI's face
CHI runs off to the chair
MOT comes over to CHI with the towel
CHI is looking down over edge of chair
MOT covers CHI with the towel and then removes it
CHI climbs off chair and walks over to table without looking at MOT
CHI is off screen under the table
<aft> MOT peeks out to see where CHI is
CHI drags hook-on chair out from under the table and over to the other chair
CHI climbs up on to the chair
MOT shows CHI the contents of the box
MOT lifts CHI away from the table and puts him down in front of the other table in the center of the room . MOT puts paper down on the table in front of CHI
MOT puts the paper and a crayon in front of CHI
MOT taps the paper with her finger
CHI walks over to the chair holding the crayon
CHI climbs up on the chair
MOT helps CHI climb up on to the chair
MOT puts the box in front of CHI on the table
<bef> MOT puts another paper in the box
CHI switches the hand that the crayon is in and takes a piece of paper out of the box
CHI examines the contents of the box
MOT looks in the box with CHI
the box slides off the table
CHI takes a piece of paper out of the box
CHI taps the crayon on the table
CHI tries to go to the desk
MOT puts the box in front of CHI
CHI takes a crayon out of the box
CHI draws on paper he holds in the air
<aft> MOT bends down to pick the crayons up
CHI puts the paper on the box on the table by the wall
MOT puts the crayons into the box
CHI takes another crayon out of the box draws briefly and then puts it into his mouth
MOT takes the crayon out of CHI's mouth
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT takes the box and paper from CHI
MOT begins to open another box
CHI pulls himself up to see inside the box
MOT gives CHI the book and then puts him on her lap
MOT sits down on floor holding CHI
MOT wraps her arm around CHI loosely
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
MOT is reaching around CHI holding the book
CHI gets up holding the book
CHI leans on the chair with his back to MOT
CHI looks at something under the table
CHI points to and looks at the camera
CHI climbs up on to the chair
CHI climbs down and gives MOT the book
CHI walks over to the table
CHI has his back to MOT
MOT pulls CHI out form under the table
MOT puts CHI on her lap
MOT holds the book open in front of CHI
CHI climbs up onto the chair
MOT stands up and puts the book away
MOT goes to the table by the wall and puts the book away
MOT gives the ball to CHI and sits in the chair next to the door
CHI lowers himself to the floor and walks with the ball
MOT gets the book out of the box
CHI plays with the ball on the chair
CHI climbs on to the chair
CHI pulls himself up and kneels on the chair
CHI stands on top of the chair
CHI puts the ball on the desk next to MOT
MOT throws the ball into the center of the room
CHI points to the ball and looks at it
CHI keeps pointing to the ball and looking at it
CHI looks at MOT and turns towards her
CHI steps off of the chair
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI chases after ball which has rolled into the corner
CHI is looking at ball <aft> CHI stares at the socket in the wall near the corner of the room
CHI looking at wall <aft> turns towards MOT
CHI throws the ball across the room then chases after it
MOT catches ball and rolls the ball at CHI
CHI crawls across the room ignoring the ball
CHI looks up at the door
MOT looks at CHI holding the ball
